name: netresearch-claude-code-marketplace
description: Curated Claude Code plugins for TYPO3 development and technical documentation workflows

plugins.name: typo3-docs
plugins.description: Create and maintain TYPO3 extension documentation following official TYPO3 documentation standards. Includes RST syntax reference, TYPO3-specific directives, local rendering, validation, and TYPO3 Intercept deployment setup.
